42 #include "Teuchos_ValidatorXMLConverter.hpp"
43 
44 namespace Teuchos{
45 
46 RCP<ParameterEntryValidator>
47 ValidatorXMLConverter::fromXMLtoValidator(
48  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
49  const IDtoValidatorMap& validatorIDsMap) const
50 {
51  #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG
52  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> dummyValidator = getDummyValidator();
53  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
54  xmlObj.getRequired(getTypeAttributeName())
55  !=
56  dummyValidator->getXMLTypeName(),
57  BadValidatorXMLConverterException,
58  "Cannot convert xmlObject " <<
59  ". Expected a " << dummyValidator->getXMLTypeName() <<
60  " tag but got a " << xmlObj.getRequired(getTypeAttributeName()) << "type");
61  #endif
62  RCP<ParameterEntryValidator> toReturn =
63  convertXML(xmlObj, validatorIDsMap);
64  return toReturn;
65 }
66 
67 XMLObject
68 ValidatorXMLConverter::fromValidatortoXML(
69  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> validator,
70  const ValidatortoIDMap& validatorIDsMap,
71  bool assignedID) const
72 {
73  #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG
74  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> dummyValidator = getDummyValidator();
75  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
76  validator->getXMLTypeName()
77  !=
78  dummyValidator->getXMLTypeName(),
79  BadValidatorXMLConverterException,
80  "Cannot convert Validator " <<
81  ". Expected a " << dummyValidator->getXMLTypeName() <<
82  " validator but got a " << validator->getXMLTypeName() << "type");
83  #endif
84  XMLObject toReturn(getValidatorTagName());
85  toReturn.addAttribute(getTypeAttributeName(), validator->getXMLTypeName());
86  if(assignedID){
87  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(validatorIDsMap.find(validator) == validatorIDsMap.end(),
88  MissingValidatorDefinitionException,
89  "Could not find an id associated with the validator in the "
90  "given validatorIDsMap to use when " <<
91  "writing it to XML!" << std::endl << std::endl);
92  toReturn.addAttribute(getIdAttributeName(),
93  validatorIDsMap.find(validator)->second);
94  }
95  convertValidator(validator, toReturn, validatorIDsMap);
96  return toReturn;
97 }
98 
99 
100 }
